app.title: Tilli Assessment App
app.description: Teacher assessment rubric scanning and manual entry application

login.title: Hello teacher! ðŸ‘‹
login.fillAllFields: Please fill in all teacher information
login.loginFailed: Failed to login. Please try again.
login.description: Enter your information to begin using the assessment system

dashboard.title: Assessment Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to create student assessments

aiPhotoScan.title: AI Photo Scan
aiPhotoScan.description: Simply take photos of your rubric sheets and let AI automatically extract all student data. Saves time and reduces manual errors.

manualEntry.title: Manual Entry
manualEntry.description: Enter student assessment data manually using the rubric form

uploadPhotos.title: Upload Rubric Photos
uploadPhotos.aiDescription: Our AI will automatically extract all student responses and scores from your rubric photos. Just upload clear photos and let the AI do the work for you!
uploadPhotos.takePhotoDescription: Use your mobile camera to capture rubric photos
uploadPhotos.uploadFilesDescription: Select existing photos from your device
uploadPhotos.dragDropText: Drag & drop photos here, or click to select files
uploadPhotos.aiAnalyzing: AI is analyzing your rubric photos
uploadPhotos.takePhotosOfRubric: Take photos of each rubric sheet. You can capture multiple photos.
uploadPhotos.cameraAccessDenied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera permissions.
uploadPhotos.noCameraFound: No camera found on this device.
uploadPhotos.unableToAccessCamera: Unable to access camera. Please check permissions.
uploadPhotos.pleaseUploadPhoto: Please upload at least one photo
uploadPhotos.errorProcessingPhotos: Error processing photos. Please try again.

manualEntry.noSavedAssessments: No saved assessments found. Add your first student below.
manualEntry.useStarRatings: Use the star ratings below to assess student performance for each criterion
manualEntry.pleaseLogIn: Please log in to save assessments
manualEntry.fillInAllNames: Please fill in all student names
manualEntry.completeGrading: Please complete grading for all students
manualEntry.errorCreatingAssessment: Error creating assessment. Please try again.

sa_1.text: The student can name and express how they or others feel.
sa_1.example: e.g. uses words like happy, sad, angry, excited

sa_2.text: The student can express their likes and dislikes.
sa_2.example: e.g. "I like drawing," "I don't want to play that"

sa_3.text: The student keeps trying even when a task is difficult.
sa_3.example: e.g. continues working on a puzzle or writing

sm_1.text: The student is able to ask for help when something is hard.
sm_1.example: e.g. says "I need help," or asks a friend

sm_2.text: The student is able to recognize the emotions of others and respond kindly.

sm_3.text: The student shows care when someone is hurt or sad.
sm_3.example: e.g. checks on them, offers a hug, says kind words

sm_4.text: The student is able to solve problems with peers peacefully.
sm_4.example: e.g. takes turns, talks it out

sm_5.text: The student is able to calm down when upset or excited.
sm_5.example: e.g. takes deep breaths, walks away, asks for a break

sm_6.text: The student can stop and think before acting.
sm_6.example: e.g. waits their turn, follows directions instead of rushing

sm_7.text: The student is aware of their strengths and areas they want to improve.

sm_8.text: The student can say what they want to learn or get better at.
sm_8.example: e.g. "I want to read more books"
